tranches.label: Yield Tranches
tranches.noVaultsAvailable: Yield Tranches vaults are currently not available %{network}. Switch to Ethereum mainnet to explore this strategy.
tranches.title:
Not all yield is created
equal: DeFi risk, adjusted
tranches.descriptionShort: Yield Tranches split any DeFi yield source into risk-adjusted classes, enabling users to construct a customized yield portfolio that suits their risk tolerance.
tranches.description:
Yield Tranches split any DeFi yield source into two new risk-adjusted classes: Senior, usually with a rather stable but lower return in exchange of a built-in coverage protection. On the other side, the Junior class usually has higher yield, as it protects the Senior class from any loss.
Yield Tranches provide risk diversification, onchain default settlement and adaptive yield split to scale liquidity in any situation.

modal.title: How Yield Tranches work
modal.subtitle: Senior & Junior Duality
modal.text:
So far, in DeFi, users shared the risk and yield pro rata, meaning they shared it entirely corresponding to their deposit. With Yield Tranches, LPs do not share all risks and yields pro rata. Instead, users can build a yield porfolio using a composition of Senior & Junior adjusted to their own risk/yield ratio.

Senior Tranches : The Senior class usually has built-in protection mechanism against losses provided by Junior liquidity, and a rather stable but lower yield.

Junior Tranches : The Junior class has higher yield and always overperform the underlying yield, as it protects the Senior class from losses.

Yield Tranches provide risk diversification, onchain default settlement and adaptive yield split to scale liquidity in any situation.

best.label: Best Yield
best.title:
Consistently seeking the best yield
in an inconsistent world
best.noVaultsAvailable: Best Yield vaults are currently not available for %{network}. Switch to Ethereum mainnet to explore this strategy.

banner.text: Best Yield meets Senior & Junior Tranches harnessing the full yield power

modal.title: How it works
modal.subtitle: Best Yield meets Senior & Junior Tranches
modal.text:
Now Best Yield Vaults are integrated with Senior & Junior Tranches.

Best Yield Vaults with Senior can deploy funds and optimize allocation into Senior Tranches, providing a wider and more fruitful yield spectrum while keeping a low-risk profile, thanks to Senior's built-in coverage.

Best Yield Vaults with Junior route deposits across multiple Junior Tranches, and automatically rebalance funds in order to seek the highest Junior APY, while providing coverage to their Senior counterparts. The Junior Best Yield Vaults represent an aggressive target risk allocation strategy, as users provide first-loss capital to an array of different Junior Tranches.

Some Best Yield Vaults, will continue to traditionally route deposits across top-tier, over-collateralized lending protocols (Aave and Compound).

best.descriptionShort: Best Yield vaults are designed to maximize yields. Like robo-advisors, deposits are routed through different strategies which seek out the highest yield available in DeFi.
best.description: Best Yield vaults are designed to maximize yields. Like robo-advisors, they accept deposits and route them through different strategies which seek out the highest yield available in DeFi. Users benefit from gas cost socialization, automated rebalancing process and algorithmic capital reallocation as opportunities arise.

pooledDeposits.title: Pooled deposits
pooledDeposits.description: Deposits are pooled together and deployed according to the last optimal allocation. Yield is compounded at every block.

yieldMonitoring.title: Automatic yield monitoring
yieldMonitoring.description: Vault scans yields every 1h to check if the current allocation is optimal across different DeFi protocols.

dynamicRebalance.title: Algorithmic and dynamic rebalance
dynamicRebalance.description: If the vault finds new opportunities, it performs a dynamic capital reallocation across different DeFi protocols to maximize yield for the liquidity present in the pool.

depositsProtection.title: Built-in deposit protection
depositsProtection.description: Senior Tranches are protected by a novel risk tranching model: any loss of capital is first absorbed by Junior Tranches, letting Senior Tranches generate yield more safely.

gauges.title: Participate in Gauges
gauges.description: Users who provide liquidity get the possibility to receive ownership of the protocol with $IDLE tokens via Gauges. Check out the Stake tab to learn more about it.

boostedYield.title: Junior Tranches
boostedYield.description: Junior Tranches allow advanced users to provide first-loss capital to specific strategies. Because they get the losses first, they also get a proportionally bigger share of the profits.

defaultManagement.title: Automatic default management
defaultManagement.description: Default events are automatically mitigated: as soon as a vault signals a loss, funds get locked and redistributed to Senior first, and then to Junior Tranches.

features.builtInProtection: Built-in loss protection provided by Junior liquidity
features.minimumYield: Minimum guaranteed yield as the underlying
features.compoundedRewards: Automatically compounded rewards to increment yield

protected.title: Senior Tranches
protected.description: Senior Tranches provide a shielded access to any DeFi yield sources. The default coverage is provided by Junior Tranches and automatically enforced by design. This makes them perfect for high-profile users that want to access DeFi yields witouth compromising their risk profile.

features.higherYield: Higher yield in exchange of risk exposure to cover Senior liquidity
features.outperformUnderlying: Always outperforming the underlying by design
features.compoundedRewards: Automatically compounded rewards to increment yield

boosted.title: Junior Tranches
boosted.description: Junior Tranches are designed to overperform any DeFi yield source. In exchange for taking on potential losses for Senior Tranches, they get a proportionally larger share of yield. This makes them perfect for advanced users that can assess risks and take them in exchange of higher returns.

institutions.title:
Institutions and
Organizations
institutions.body: Avoid the need to integrate multiple yield sources, and achieve the best risk adjusted yield with just one integration, powered by ERC-4626.

security

bodies.amountStakingInfo: You can stake any amount of %{assetName} and they‚Äôll immediately beginning earning rewards.
bodies.withdrawInfo: You can withdraw your rewards at anytime, which requires a small gas fee around ~$.01.
bodies.unbondingInfo: When you unstake your tokens, they‚Äôll remain locked for %{unbondingDays} days, during which time they won‚Äôt earn rewards. After the %{unbondingDays} days, your %{assetName} will return to your Primary Wallet.
bodies.slashingInfo: Staking is done through a validator. It‚Äôs incredibly rare, but if the validator you‚Äôve staked with messes up by allowing false or incorrect transactions to go through, you could lose a part of your assets.
bodies.partnerInfo: We‚Äôve mitigated this risk by partnering with a reputable validator‚Äîwhich has a secure, reliable, and audited infrastructure.

tooltips.spotApy: The annualized yield this vault is providing at the current block
tooltips.autoCompounding: These rewards are automatically re-invested in the strategy
tooltips.gaugeRewards: By staking in the gauge you are entitled to receive these rewards
tooltips.idleDistribution: The total amount of IDLE distributed daily for the entire pool
tooltips.stakingTotalRewards: The total amount of rewards distributed by the staking contract
tooltips.lastHarvest: The amount of the last harvest, automatically re-invested in the strategy
tooltips.juniorTrancheApy: The APY is calculating by adding together the Base APY and Harvest APY
tooltips.nextWeight: The percentage of IDLE distributed to this gauge starting from the next epoch
tooltips.vaultStatus: This badge shows whether the vault is in Production, Experimental or Deprected
tooltips.apyBoost: This value indicates how many times this vault performs better than the base strategy
tooltips.stkIDLEBalance: This is your stkIDLE balance, the longer you stake the higher this balance will be
tooltips.seniorTrancheApy: The APY is calculating by adding together the Base APY, Gauge APY and Harvest APY
tooltips.coverage: In case of hack, the Senior tranche is covered by the funds deposited in the Junior tranche
tooltips.stakingAPY: Estimate of the IDLE buyback distribution over 1 year based on the current stkIDLE supply
tooltips.apyRatio: The base strategy yield is split across the Senior and Junior tranches with a specific ratio
tooltips.lockEndDate: This is the expiration date of your lock, after this date you will be able to withdraw your IDLE
tooltips.stakingShare: This percentage indicates the portion of rewards that will be reserved for you at every distribution
tooltips.deprecated: This vault is sunsetting and in withdrawal-only mode, please withdraw all deposits at earliest opportunity
tooltips.AA: This Best Yield Vault can deploy funds into Senior Tranches, providing higher yields while keeping a low-risk profile, thanks to Seniors‚Äô built-in coverage
tooltips.BB: This Best Yield Vault routes deposits across multiple Junior Tranches, and automatically rebalance funds in order to seek the highest Junior APY, while providing coverage to their Senior counterparts

riskProfiles.BY_AA: This Best Yield Vault can deploy funds into Senior Tranches, providing higher yields while keeping a low-risk profile, thanks to Seniors‚Äô built-in coverage
riskProfiles.BY_BB: This Best Yield Vault routes deposits across multiple Junior Tranches, and automatically rebalance funds in order to seek the highest Junior APY, while providing coverage to their Senior counterparts
riskProfiles.AA_AA: The Senior class has built-in protection mechanism against losses provided by Junior liquidity, and a rather stable byt lower yield.
riskProfiles.BB_BB: The Junior class has higher yield and always overperform the underlying yield, as it protects the Senior class from losses.

assetHeader.SegwitNativeTooltip: Recommended for most users. Only use the other addresses if you know what they are for
assetHeader.assetUnavailable: Market data for this asset isn't available yet. We're working on it, hang tight!

rewards.currentAPYLabel: The current APY for your rewards
rewards.distributedRewards: By depositing is this vault you will receive additional rewards that are distributed weekly.

assetCards.stakingBody: Earn passive income by staking your assets or depositing them into a DeFi strategy.

foxPage.foxDescription: Since 2019, our shapeshifting FOX Token has been offering users an ever-expanding world of utility and advantages. Today, our ERC-20 governance token not only enables you to influence the future of ShapeShift through your vote, you also have an ever-expanding universe of investing opportunities. Invest, track, and manage your FOX holdings here.
foxPage.mainStakingDescription: Put your FOX to work in single-sided staking contracts to earn FOX rewards. (FOX can still be used in governance while staked, but is otherwise locked into the contract during staking.)
foxPage.tradingUnavailable: %{assetSymbol} is not yet tradeable on ShapeShift. You can trade %{assetSymbol} on ElasticSwap.

otherOpportunitiesDescription.FOX: Explore the many opportunities for providing liquidity, farming for yield, lending and borrowing. Click the ‚ÄúGet Started‚Äù links below to visit the external sites of interest to learn more‚Äîand put your FOX to work for you.
otherOpportunitiesDescription.FOXy: Quickly and easily purchase FOXy, the industry‚Äôs first DAO rebasing token that offers both yield and profit rewards.

foxPage.governanceDescription: As a FOX holder, you can have a voice in the future of ShapeShift. Below are active or recently passed DAO proposals voted on by token holders.

optInModal.title: Help us improve ShapeShift
optInModal.description: ShapeShift would like to gather usage data to better understand how our users interact with the app. This data will be used to continually improve the usability and user experience of our product.
optInModal.noThanks: No thanks, take me to the private version
optInModal.sendEvents: Send anonymized click and pageview events
optInModal.neverCollectPersonalInformations: Never collect keys, addresses, transactions, balances, or any personal information
optInModal.neverCollectIp: Never collect your full IP address

banner.title: Get a Yat
banner.description: Your Yat is your universal emoji username, website URL, payment address, and more.
